title: Hokies bounce back to even series against Wright State - VT hokiesports.com
content: Hokies bounce back to even series against Wright State  VT hokiesports.com
description: Pairing 15 hits with three composed pitching efforts on Saturday, the Virginia Tech baseball team bounced back in a big way against Wright State as the Hokies defeated the Raiders, 9-3, to even the weekend series at English Field at Atlantic Union Bank Park.
